title: Australian [colour] diary. No. 027
brief_description: This cinemagazine shows the ceremonial opening of Macquarie University in Sydney. A new pattern of study will enable students to participate in a variety of subjects in different faculties. Kathleen Geldard, member of the Australian Ballet Company describes her life of travel, rehearsals and performances.
